info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 7:16PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Brown, northern Coleman and east central Runnels Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 715 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Talpa, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Coleman, Grosvenor, Valera, Glen Cove, Talpa, Echo and Hords Creek Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
